Job Description: Job Description:1.Develop, Maintain & Support Web portals / applications onboarded in multiple client environments.2.Developing back-end & front-end modules with an optimized database and latest front-end frameworks.3.Troubleshooting application and code issues.4.Updating and altering application features to enhance performance.5.Involve in full life-cycle application development.6.Ensure developed pages are responsive, W3C compliant and are cross browser compatible, provide full proof suggestions to optimization and best practices.7.Work with a creative thinking and a result-oriented approach.Desired Candidate Profile.1. Web development skills as a PHP Developer / PHP Programmer including framework, PHP, Apache, MySQL, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax.2. - Strong Experience in Core PHP & PHP Frameworks (CodeIgnitor). 3.Demonstrable UI / frontend skills using JQuery, HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Bootstrap, Reactjs / Angular. Experience working with responsive & adaptive designs.
